Instruction: Preheat the oven to 425 degrees Fahrenheit (220 degrees Celsius) and grease a 9x13-inch baking pan.
Combine water with flour, baking powder, and salt in the bowl of an electric mixer fitted with a dough hook or a large mixing bowl. Knead dough until it forms a ball.

Spread the dough in a greased baking pan to a thickness of half an inch using oiled fingers. The dough will be sticky and elastic. It's okay if it's not perfectly even, just ensure there are no holes. Coat the top and sides of the dough with olive oil, then season with cayenne, garlic salt, and basil.
Bake in the oven for 20 minutes. Take out, sprinkle with Parmesan cheese, and bake for another 5 minutes until golden.
